performing_artist_name.description: Name of a person or full name of a group that has performed the work in public. Note that if the performer is known by a single name, it should be entered in this field.

performing_artist_first_name.description: First name of a person that has performed the work in public. .

performing_artist_ipi_name_number.description: (not requires if structred under "PER") The IPI Name Number corresponding to this performing artist. Values reside in the IPI database.

isni.description: (not needed if nested nder "PER") The ISNI assigned to the performing artist.

performance_language.description: The language used in the performance. Values and reference for this field reside in the Language Code Table.

language_code.description: The Language code of the name. Values and reference for this field reside in the Language Code Table.

script_code.description: The code representing the language script of this Live Performing Artist. These values and reference reside in the Script Code Table.
